Articles.Content:
KSP doesn't load this part. PartsLab gives the 'array index out of bounds' error.

I tried just about everything, nothing works... contents of the part folder: http://dl.dropbox.com/u/2808338/kerbality/landingGearPod.zip

The .blend file I used is included.

Textures! The damn things only need textures!

Not just materials...
